code: import React from"react";export default function CurrentDate(props){var days=["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"];var day=days[props.date.getDay()];var hours=props.date.getHours();var minutes=props.date.getMinutes();if(hours<10){hours="0".concat(hours);}if(minutes<10){minutes="0".concat(minutes);}return"".concat(day," ").concat(hours,":").concat(minutes);}
